CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Quarter relative to Outer Rim Settlements?
SRP.A: Crimson Quarter is {below} Outer Rim Settlements in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total life expectancy?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Outer Rim Settlements}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total life expectancy?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Quarter}.

VE.Q: What is Crimson Quarter's Life Expectancy in 1962?
VE.A: Crimson Quarter's life expectancy in 1962 is {47.52} years.

VE.Q: What is Outer Rim Settlements's Life Expectancy in 1957?
VE.A: Outer Rim Settlements's life expectancy in 1957 is {79.85} years.

VE.Q: What is Verdant Ward's Life Expectancy in 1967?
VE.A: Verdant Ward's life expectancy in 1967 is {144.26} years.

VE.Q: What are the life expectancy of Verdant Ward, Outer Rim Settlements, and Crimson Quarter in 1963?
VE.A: Verdant Ward's life expectancy is {119.51} years, Outer Rim Settlements's life expectancy is {141.35} years, Crimson Quarter's life expectancy is {42.64} years.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Life Expectancy in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum life expectancy is {27.49} years.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Life Expectancy in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum life expectancy is {207.46} years.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Life Expectancy level recorded for Crimson Quarter?
EVJ.A: Crimson Quarter reached approximately {80.10} years in {1957}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Life Expectancy level recorded for Crimson Quarter?
EVJ.A: Crimson Quarter's lowest recorded level is approximately {27.49} years in {1967}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Life Expectancy?
SC.A: The average total life expectancy is {296.84} years.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Life Expectancy exceed 318.55 years? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Life Expectancy fall between 276.27 and 305.35 years? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Life Expectancy go below 263.07 years? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1958 and 1965, did the total Life Expectancy experience a larger or smaller change than between 1958 and 1964?
NC.A: The change in total life expectancy between 1958 and 1965 was {larger} than between 1958 and 1964.

NC.Q: Was the total Life Expectancy in 1957 higher or lower than in 1959?
NC.A: The total life expectancy in 1957 was {lower} than in 1959.

NC.Q: Between 1964 and 1967, was the average total Life Expectancy higher or lower than between 1961 and 1967?
NC.A: The average total life expectancy between 1964 and 1967 was {higher} than between 1961 and 1967.

NC.Q: Between 1961 and 1962, was the average total Life Expectancy higher or lower than between 1963 and 1966?
NC.A: The average total life expectancy between 1961 and 1962 was {lower} than between 1963 and 1966.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Outer Rim Settlements} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Crimson Quarter, Verdant Ward, Outer Rim Settlements}.
